title: BRIEF-Mylan To Acquire The Global Marketing Rights To Glatiramer Acetate Product Through An Investment And Partnership With Israeli Company Mapi Pharma
text:
Market News April 10, 2018 / 11:37 AM / Updated 5 minutes ago BRIEF-Mylan To Acquire The Global Marketing Rights To Glatiramer Acetate Product Through An Investment And Partnership With Israeli Company Mapi Pharma Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 10 (Reuters) - Mylan NV: 
* MYLAN TO ACQUIRE THE GLOBAL MARKETING RIGHTS TO A ONCE-MONTHLY GLATIRAMER ACETATE PRODUCT THROUGH AN INVESTMENT AND PARTNERSHIP WITH ISRAELI COMPANY MAPI PHARMA 
* CO, MAPI PHARMA TO PARTNER ON DEVELOPMENT & COMMERCIALIZATION OF GA DEPOT, A LONG-ACTING GLATIRAMER ACETATE PRODUCT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
